author: Adela Suliman and Andy Eckardt and Gabe Joselow
title: Get out of jail card? Prisoners released around the world
description: Countries are freeing prisoners to stem the spread of the coronavirus in crowded jails or free up space needed for patients suffering from the disease.
content:
As the coronavirus pandemic sweeps the globe, some countries are freeing prisoners to stem the spread of the virus in crowded jails or free up space for COVID-19 patients.
Iran have already released 80,000 prisoners, according to official reports. Among them… [+3111 chars]
